title: Learn, Experience and Enjoy Driving in SINGAPORE
description: Vroom Town is Singapore's first drive-play city for kids, offering a unique and immersive learning experience. Children can learn about road safety and traffic rules while enjoying the thrill of driving their own miniature vehicles in a realistic city environment. The facility features various themed zones, including a petrol station, car wash, and construction site, providing a fun and educational experience for young drivers. It is designed to promote cognitive development, problem-solving skills, and social interaction in a safe and engaging setting. Perfect for children aged 3 to 10, Vroom Town offers a memorable and enriching experience that combines learning and play.

title: VroomTown™ - Drive-Play City for Kids
blurb: Mega indoor drive-play city and playground for kids!
description: VroomTown™ is a mega indoor drive-play city and playground featuring multiple Singapore icons including the Merlion, Gardens by the Bay and Changi Airport! The realistic city driving experience also includes traffic lights & rules, a large indoor playground and a drive-through for kids! Located in Marina Square, VroomTown™ offers a unique and engaging experience for children to learn about road safety and Singapore's landmarks in a fun and interactive environment. The playground features various play areas designed to stimulate creativity and physical activity, making it an ideal destination for families looking for a memorable day out.
full_address: Located in Marina Square, VroomTown™ is a mega indoor drive-play city and playground featuring multiple Singapore icons including the Merlion, Gardens by the Bay and Changi Airport! The realistic city driving experience also includes traffic lights & rules, a large indoor playground and a drive-through for kids

title: VROOMTOWN ™ Birthday Parties and School Trips
blurb: Host A B'Day Party School Trip TeamBonding Like No Other!
description: VROOMTOWN offers unique birthday party, school trip, and team bonding experiences. They provide a memorable and engaging environment for various celebrations and group activities. VROOMTOWN is designed to cater to different age groups and interests, ensuring that every event is tailored to meet the specific needs and preferences of the participants. With a focus on creating fun and interactive experiences, VROOMTOWN aims to deliver unforgettable moments for all attendees. The venue is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and staffed by experienced professionals dedicated to providing exceptional service.
